One Hour Drama: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Rita and Burton Goldberg Department of Dramatic Writing About the Program/Admissions Admissions Student Life Course Offerings News & Events Work of Writing Students Screenplay Showcase Fellowships/Contests Script Bank Sloan Winners Admin & Faculty Alumni Internships Contact  home > Dramatic Writing        One Hour Drama  DWPG.2048 Lect 3 Credits This workshop course takes students step-by-step through writing their own script for an ongoing one-hour television dramatic series. The course will go from premise lines, through the outline/beat sheet, to writing a draft of the script that may be polished in Advanced TV or Thesis TV. As a goal, students will complete and revise a full 1-Hour story and at least half a script. (No pilots.)
